typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMAIL as string,
		ALTERNATIVE_MAIL as string,
		NAME as string,
		FN as string,
		SN as string,
		PN1 as string,
		PN2 as string,
		CTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(NEW_SN = iif(instr(FN, " ") >= 0, substring(FN,instr(FN, " "), length(FN) ), ""),
		NEW_FN = iif(instr(FN, " ") >= 0, substring(FN,1, instr(FN, " ") - 1), FN)) ~> SNStream
SNStream sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Email as string,
		AltEmail as string,
		Name as string,
		FN as string,
		PN1 as string,
		PN2 as string,
		CTY as string,
		id as integer,
		SN as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Email = EMAIL,
		AltEmail = ALTERNATIVE_MAIL,
		Name = NAME,
		FN = NEW_FN,
		PN1,
		PN2,
		CTY = CTR,
		SN = NEW_SN
	)) ~> sink1
